Deuteronomy 6:8.en: Bind them as a sign on your hand and let them serve as a symbol on your forehead;
Deuteronomy 6:8.he: וּקְשַׁרְתָּ֥ם לְא֖וֹת עַל־יָדֶ֑ךָ וְהָי֥וּ לְטֹטָפֹ֖ת בֵּ֥ין עֵינֶֽיךָ׃

Deuteronomy 6:9.en: inscribe them on the doorposts of your house and on your gates.

Psalms 121:5.en:
The LORD is your guardian,
the LORD is your protection
at your right hand.
Psalms 121:5.he: יְהֹוָ֥ה שֹׁמְרֶ֑ךָ יְהֹוָ֥ה צִ֝לְּךָ֗ עַל־יַ֥ד יְמִינֶֽךָ׃
